column4: when i enable the desktop effects, all the window bars disappear
I had that problem before...did the frames around your windows disappear?
yep. no window borders. effects were working before...
the problem I had was when I enabled desktop effects, the minimize buttons and close buttons disappear
I fixed it by reinstalling compiz
Then I ran sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop
what does it say when you try sudo apt-get install compiz?
i'm using synaptic, and it was already installed
anyway, reinstalling compiz and ubuntu-desktop did the job for me...I didn't have to remove them first
what do you think i'm doing
